page.title: 15Children's Favourite Games 2
page.content: My favourite game is football a very popular game in Long Lawford as elsewhere.My favourite professional team is Manchester United eventhough the local side is Coventry City. There are many local amateur sides playing football either on a Saturday or Sunday and these are made up of both children and adults. I have played soccer,as football is properly called, for the school team on a number of occasions,but nearly every day I go out and play with a ball in the nearby park.I play with a group of other boys and often use our jumpers laid on the ground as the goal posts. We usually know where the pitch side lines are by instinct and so eventhough there are many arguments just like in the real game we still enjoy the game tremendously.
